info.title: Dobby OpenApi
info.description:
This is a public api provided for Application Developers, the system includes,
 *      Users and Permissions
 *      Customer and Suppliers
 *      Products and Inventories
 *      Sales and Purchases
 *      Accouting

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: verification token you get after sign-up

200.description: Upon Successful Login you can add the Bearer access_token on the Authorization Above click the green icon

400.description: When email or password are wrong or in a bad format

parameters.description: If all is enabled it will try to retrieve all data, and may cause the request to crash

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: skips a few data before getting the data, basically if you offset 3, it will start to get the 4th data from the db result

parameters.description: sorts a key descending and ascending

bill_due.description: Contact Bill Due is a whole number say ex. 5

bill_due_type.description: Contact Bill Due Type is a string

invoice_due.description: Contact Invoice Due is a whole number say ex. 5

invoice_due_type.description: Contact Invoice Due Type is a string

order_type.description: Order types are SO, PO, QU, BILL, INV, RM, SM}

contact_name.description: Contact Name is required if contact_id is not provided

end_date.description: end date is not required when is credit note is true

reference.example: Suscipit eaque rerum rerum. Perferendis vitae unde et et excepturi.

tax_setting.description: tax setting are, no tax, tax exclusive, tax inclusive

status.description: Status for the order, currently supports, DRAFT, FOR_APPROVAL, APPROVED, PAID, VOID, SENT

exchange_rate.description: is by default 1, if you set a different other than the default it will divide it by the exchange rate

description.example: Illo laboriosam eius sint quae sit iste ut quisquam.

unit_price.description: Contact Person is the primary contact person

discount.description: Contact Person is included on emails
